title: New: Wih’lo – It’s True
content:
Despite still being in his teens, Chicago based producer Wih’lo is beginning to make quite a name for himself, with his debut EP Wasted featuring on several of the internet’s hottest music blogs.

New track It’s True is a bolder, more atmospheric number, fusing glitchy vocal samples with minimal, dubstep inspired beats, producing what may well be his best work yet. It’s True is a sign of great things to come from this young artist.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
